intro.para: We will frequently encounter sets of numbers which correspond to a line segment on the number line. Such a set of numbers is called an interval.

info.caption: Explanation
info.para: as: ‘the closed interval from a to b is defined to be the set of all those x in R such that a less than or equal to x less than or equal to b’.

info.caption: Explanation
info.para: as: ‘the left closed right open interval from a to b is defined to be the set of all those x in R such that a less than or equal to x less than b’.
The remaining definitions of intervals are read similarly.
